articles.author: Kelsey Vlamis
articles.title: Americans tourists can't quit Europe: Why Euro summer travel is still on for many, even in this economy - Business Insider
articles.description: Plenty of Americans are sticking to their summer travel plans to Europe despite concerns about the economy.
articles.content:
The American dream may be struggling, but for many, the Euro summer dream is alive and well.
Jimin Shim, a millennial copywriter who lives in Denver, has plenty of concerns about the economy, from s… [+6639 chars]
